Nature :- You and I are identical twins. That is, we are the children of Mantena Pedda Jamalaya. Therefore, due to my great love for you, I have decided to transfer some property in your name. As per the schedule, the property belongs to me, that is, my father Mantena Pedda Jamalaya belongs to me with all rights.28.03.2025
Year. I am free to enjoy the land as per the settlement deed registered in the office of the Sub-Registrar, Vissannapet, in Book 1, No. 2212/2025, registered in my name on the date of the settlement deed. Accordingly, my father has applied for a change of boundaries in the said deed No. 2212/2025 on 21.05.2025. By virtue of the deed of amendment registered in the office of the Sub-Registrar, Chintalapudi, Book 1, No. 4224/2025, I hereby transfer to you the immovable property worth Rs. 5,20,000/- in letters, five lakh twenty thousand rupees, including the R.C.C. terrace house etc., having a plot of land of 193.6 sq.m., which has come into my possession and has been in my absolute possession up to this date, and which has been transferred to me as a gift, free of charge, in consideration of my love for you. Therefore, from now on, you will enjoy the property, including water, money, treasure, deposits, and stones, with all the full rights of your son, I hereby declare the property as per Schedule to be an undisputed property with no encroachments till date. The property as per Schedule is not a land assigned by the Government. The transfer of title is to be filed for the purpose of changing your name in the village census. The property as per Schedule does not belong to any government institution. There are no dues in any government institution. Notice forms are hereby filed. .M. Kandalarao

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 11664 of 2025, dated 22/Oct/2025, executed by Mantena Kondala Rao in favour of his Sister, Misimitla Pdama towards the property admeasuring an extent of 193.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-48, Assessment No. 198, comprised in survey number 150/1, situated in Madhavaram (East) Village & Grama Panchayati, A Konduru Mandal, within the District of NTR, registered at sub-registrar office Nuzvidu, is bounded as follows:

North by: Property of Mandam Kannaiah
South by: Road
East by: Road
West by: Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
